item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Gerrit, GitButler, and Jujutsu projects collaborating on change-id commit footer (83 points | 14 comments)
2. AI ambivalence (58 points | 26 comments)
3. Grepping logs remains terrible (49 points | 40 comments)
4. How crawlers impact the operations of the Wikimedia projects (36 points | 12 comments)
5. Minimal CSS-only blurry image placeholders (9 points | 2 comments)
6. chawan: TUI Web Browser (23 points | 13 comments)
7. Keeping the LHC colliding: Providing Extended Lifecycle support for EL7 (by moving to Debian) (4 points | 2 comments)
8. Django 5.2 released (25 points | 5 comments)
9. Valkey - A new hash table (16 points | 2 comments)
10. The Fifth Kind of Optimisation (12 points | 16 comments)
11. C++26: variadic friends (5 points | 1 comment)
12. Graphite (Rusty FOSS procedural 2D design app) new feature demos from Q4 (1 points | no comments)
13. OpenSSH 10 call for testing, DSA deprecated (5 points | no comments)
14. DST for async Rust (3 points | no comments)
15. A Year of Rust in ClickHouse (11 points | no comments)
16. Nelm, a Helm 3 alternative, is generally available now (2 points | no comments)
17. xan: The CSV magician (26 points | 3 comments)
18. Test Sizes (2010) (6 points | 3 comments)
19. Cell Phone OPSEC for Border Crossings (7 points | 2 comments)
20. Tailscale Enterprise Plan 9 Support (28 points | 3 comments)
21. An asynchronous VsCode-like HTTP plugin for Neovim (4 points | no comments)
22. Automated deployments: how we made deploying often easy (3 points | 4 comments)
23. new state of the art turing test: drawing a rubik's cube (36 points | 16 comments)
24. Train & Weather Tracker with Raspberry Pi & E-Ink (11 points | 6 comments)
25. arena: Arena Allocator implementation in pure C as an stb-style single-file library (1 points | no comments)
